item.title: 葡萄牙将接替森特诺出任央行行长
item.description: 据一位熟悉葡萄牙总理想法的人士透露，葡萄牙总理路易斯-黑山计划在央行行长马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）的第一个任期于 7 月 19 日结束后将其换掉。【原文：Portuguese Prime Minister Luis Montenegro plans to replace central bank Governor Mario Centeno after his first term ends July 19, according to a person familiar with the premier’s thinking.】

item.title: 英国乙醇产业濒临灭绝，可能对肉类、啤酒等造成冲击
item.description: 美国 14 亿升廉价生物燃料的浪潮有可能使英国国内的两家乙醇生产商一蹶不振，还可能扰乱从肉类包装到啤酒酿造的一系列英国工业。【原文：A 1.4 billion-liter tide of cheap US biofuels threatens to wipe out both of the UK’s domestic ethanol producers, and could also disrupt a range of British industries from meat packing to making beer.】

item.title: Nextdoor 与地方新闻建立不可能的合作关系
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Riley Griffin 报道地方新闻机构与邻里社交平台 Nextdoor 之间的新合作。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin reports on a new partnership between local news organizations and neighborhood social platform Nextdoor.】

item.title: 根据特朗普协议，印尼迎来与美国贸易的 "新时代
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）周三证实，他与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成了一项19%的关税协议。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto on Wednesday confirmed he struck a 19% tariff deal with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 东南亚最大经济体成为全球交易制造者
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注东南亚最大经济体的国际交易。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at international deal-making by Southeast Asia’s biggest economy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 微软的 Copilot 挑战：9 亿次 ChatGPT 下载
item.description: 泰森-乔明（Tyson Jominy）经常通过点击电脑上的 "Copilot "键来召唤微软公司的人工智能助手。这并不是他的本意。实际上，他的目标是曾经的 "控制 "键，当看到 Copilot 出现在屏幕上时，他非常恼火。【原文：Tyson Jominy routinely summons Microsoft Corp.’s AI assistant by tapping the Copilot key on his computer. Not because he means to. He’s actually aiming for what was once the Control key and is annoyed to see Copilot pop up on-screen.】

item.title: 美国购房申请在前一周激增后有所下降
item.description: 由于借贷成本居高不下，上周美国购房抵押贷款申请降至 5 月底以来的最低水平。【原文：US mortgage applications to buy a home declined last week to the lowest level since late May as borrowing costs remained elevated.】

item.title: KKR 敦促投资者拥抱风险资产，规避美元疲软
item.description: KKR & Co.表示，投资者可能低估了股票和其他风险资产进一步上涨的潜力，但他们应该对冲美元走弱、债券收益率上升和波动性加大的威胁。【原文：Investors may underestimate the potential for further gains in stocks and other risk assets but they should hedge against the threat of a weaker dollar, higher bond yields and greater volatility, according to KKR & Co.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称帝亚吉欧开始物色新首席执行官接替黛布拉-克鲁
item.description: 帝亚吉欧集团计划更换首席执行官黛布拉-克鲁（Debra Crew），此前该公司曾遭遇利润预警和美国关税威胁。【原文：Diageo Plc is planning to replace Chief Executive Officer Debra Crew, after a bruising run in which the company has suffered a profit warning and the threat of tariffs in the US.】

item.title: Robinhood 高管称英国上市改革已 "成功一半
item.description: Robinhood Markets 公司英国负责人乔丹-辛克莱尔（Jordan Sinclair）在回应政府为鼓励在伦敦上市而采取的一系列改革措施时说，英国在解决资本市场问题方面已经 "成功了一半"。【原文：Britain is “halfway” toward fixing issues with its capital markets, said Jordan Sinclair, the UK head of Robinhood Markets Inc., in reaction to a series of reforms by the government to incentivize listing in London.】

item.title: 中国多晶硅价格飙升，涨势持续第三周
item.description: 在政府努力应对产能过剩的背景下，中国多晶硅价格连续第三周上涨。【原文：Polysilicon prices in China rallied for the third week amid government efforts to combat overcapacity.】

item.title: 印度寻求比印尼更低的关税以争取达成协议
item.description: 印度官员希望与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成一项关税税率低于他与印尼达成的协议的贸易协议，因为新德里正在努力赶上 8 月 1 日的最后期限。【原文：Indian officials are hoping to secure a trade deal with US President Donald Trump at a lower tariff rate than he’d agreed with Indonesia as New Delhi races to meet an Aug. 1 deadline.】

item.title: PNC 借贷增长，净利息收入超出预期
item.description: 受贷款增长的帮助，PNC 金融服务集团第二季度净利息收入超出预期。【原文：PNC Financial Services Group beat expectations for second-quarter net interest income, helped by an increase in loan growth.】

item.title: 日本公司以创纪录的销售额席卷全球债券市场
item.description: 债务银行家和投资者正准备迎接全球信贷市场的下一个大趋势：日本公司在海外融资数十亿美元。【原文：Debt bankers and investors are bracing for what is shaping up to be the next big trend in the global credit market: Japan Inc. raising billions abroad.】

item.title: 股票策略师难以跟上特朗普的步伐
item.description:
S&P 500 预测受到政策变化的影响。【原文：

S&P 500 forecasts have been whipsawed by changing policies. 

】

item.title: 意大利打击为洛洛-皮亚纳、阿玛尼和迪奥提供原料的血汗工厂
item.description: 十年来，一位中国裁缝在米兰郊区一栋三层楼的建筑里辛勤工作，每天工作 13 个小时，为意大利羊绒品牌 Loro Piana 等品牌制作高档服装。【原文：For a decade, a Chinese tailor toiled in a three-story building on the outskirts of Milan, working 13 hours a day making high-end garments for brands including Italian cashmere label Loro Piana.】

item.title: 伦敦房租涨幅降至两年多来最慢
item.description: 伦敦房租上涨的速度回落到两年多来最慢，专家们认为这一转变是由于移民人数减少以及房价已成为许多居民难以承受之重。【原文：The pace of London rent increases pulled back to the slowest in over two years, a shift experts pinned on falling immigration and prices that have become unaffordable to many residents.】

item.title: 德国央行称德国第二季度经济可能停滞不前
item.description: 据德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）称，德国经济在年初出人意料地强劲扩张后，第二季度可能未能实现增长。【原文：Germany’s economy probably failed to grow in the second quarter after a surprisingly strong expansion at the start of the year, according to Bundesbank.】

item.title: 德国央行称欧洲央行在决定量化宽松时必须考虑损失
item.description: 德国央行表示，欧洲央行在决定未来是否通过大规模购买债券来刺激需求时，必须考虑潜在的损失。【原文：The European Central Bank must consider potential losses when deciding in the future whether to stimulate demand through large-scale bond-buying, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 瑞典制药商索比不认为医药关税 "迫在眉睫
item.description: 制药商瑞典Orphan Biovitrum AB公司首席执行官吉多-奥尔科斯（Guido Oelkers）表示，他认为对制药业的关税威胁不可能马上出现。【原文：Drugmaker Swedish Orphan Biovitrum AB’s Chief Executive Officer Guido Oelkers said he doesn’t think tariff threats on the pharmaceutical industry are likely to materialize imminently.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团（ING）的 Pesole 说：法国预算是欧元的 "定时炸弹
item.description: 荷兰国际集团（ING Groep NV）的策略师认为，围绕法国如何控制其不断膨胀的预算赤字的忧虑正在重返金融市场，并可能开始削弱对欧元的需求。【原文：Angst around how France will control its swelling budget deficit is returning to financial markets and may start to dent demand for the euro, according to strategists at ING Groep NV.】

item.title: 莫桑比克卡奥拉巴萨水电站改造将提高产量
item.description: 莫桑比克的卡奥拉巴萨水电站将进行改造，这将略微增强其发电能力并提高可靠性。【原文：Mozambique’s Cahora Bassa hydropower plant will undergo a revamp that will slightly bolster its generation capacity and improve reliability.】

item.title: 据说施耐德正在洽谈收购淡马锡在印度合资公司中的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，施耐德电气 SE 正在考虑从少数合伙人淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）手中收购其印度合资企业的剩余股份。【原文：Schneider Electric SE is considering buying out the remaining stake in its India venture from minority partner Temasek Holdings Pte, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 系统性基金准备向美股投资 480 亿美元
item.description: 快钱投资者准备在未来几周向美股投入新资金，为股市创下新纪录的涨势提供支持。【原文：Fast-money investors are poised to deploy fresh capital into US stocks in coming weeks, offering support to a rally that has taken equities to new records.】

item.title: 国债收益率维持在近一个月高位，交易员等待生产者价格数据
item.description: 美国国债收益率徘徊在一个月来的最高水平附近，交易员们在等待生产者价格数据，这些数据可能会提供更多贸易关税刺激通胀的证据。【原文：US Treasury yields hovered around their highest levels in a month as traders awaited data on producer prices that could provide more evidence trade tariffs are stoking inflation.】

item.title: 洛瓦格里奥表示，Monte Paschi 将在交易后更换 Mediobanca 首席执行官
item.description: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 首席执行官路易吉-洛瓦格里奥（Luigi Lovaglio）表示，如果他成功控制了 Mediobanca SA，他将寻求取代 Mediobanca SA 的同行。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA Chief Executive Officer Luigi Lovaglio said he will seek to replace his counterpart at Mediobanca SA, should he succeed in taking control of the larger rival.】

item.title: 新世界寻求出售 11 Skies 机场购物中心以增强流动性
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新世界发展有限公司正在寻求出售其旗舰商场 11 Skies，以解决流动资金紧张的问题。【原文：New World Development Co. is seeking to sell its flagship 11 Skies mall to address liquidity constraints, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港交易所就将交易结算时间缩短至一天进行磋商
item.description: 香港建议将股票交易的结算时间减半至一天，以便更好地与国际和中国大陆的标准接轨。【原文：Hong Kong proposed to half the time it takes to settle stock trades to one day to align better with international and mainland Chinese standards.】

item.title: 追求无宿醉的狂欢
item.description: 初创公司 GABA Labs 正在测试一种添加剂，该公司称这种添加剂将使无酒精饮料更上一层楼。【原文：Startup GABA Labs is testing an additive that it says will take nonalcoholic drinks to the next level.】

item.title: 欧洲可可生产放缓凸显全球巧克力业困境
item.description: 欧洲可可工厂的生产放缓正在加深，这凸显了历史性的高价格是如何抑制需求并损害这个巧克力第一大消费地区加工商的利润的。【原文：The slowdown at Europe’s cocoa factories is deepening, highlighting how historically high prices are curbing demand and hurting processors’ profits in the top chocolate consuming region.】
